item.description:
Greetings Everyone,
I want to let you know about a seminar I will be giving about meditation.

QUIETING THE MIND
Peace of mind is a treasure that many seek. The mind seems to have a life of its own, with random thoughts, worries and fears that can be overwhelming. Since who we are and what we become depends on what we think, it is essential to master the mind. Through concentration and meditation you can come to know the peace that emerges from a quiet mind attuned to the One Mind of God. From this place, you can create exactly the life you want.

Saturday May 19th
With Rev. Gabrielle Zeludancz
@ The Center of Light
97 Perkins Street
Jamaica Plain
7pm $15 (COVERS THE COST FOR THE SPACE) members of meet up can come for $10
item.name: Quieting the Mind (Meditation Seminar)
